submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontal_sorted = list(reversed(sorted(horizontalCut)))
        vertical_sorted = list(reversed(sorted(verticalCut)))
        horizontal_sorted.append(0) # length: m
        vertical_sorted.append(0) # length: n
        h = 0
        v = 0
        res = 0
        while h < m - 1 or v < n - 1:
            hcost = horizontal_sorted[h] * (v + 1)
            vcost = vertical_sorted[v] * (h + 1)
            if horizontal_sorted[h] > vertical_sorted[v]:
                h += 1
                res += hcost
            else:
                v += 1
                res += vcost
        return res
